message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $12,000.  I believe in its value and think it would be a great investment for you. What do you think?
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my price reflects the true value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
